message: I simply do not understand why folks are so consumed and feel personally invested in Beyonce's relationship as if it was their own. Then the total media focus as if this is world changing information and needs to be analyzed for some deep meaning. I will state it here as I have stated elsewhere, it feels like we are existing in some Ashton Kutcher reality show highschool version of PUNKED with a dash of the movie Clueless. Meanwhile, the rest of the world is focusing on real issues.
